product.title: Curious George Tin Pail
product.description: Curious George is a cute little monkey whose curiosity sometimes gets him into trouble. The Curious George Tin Pail makes a nice indoor storage container for goodies and toys. It's a great addition to outdoor fun. A colorful image of Curious George is emblazoned across the yellow pail.

product.title: Curious George Tin Music Radio
product.description: Wind up this red and yellow Curious George Tin Music Radio and turn the knob to hear a delightful melody. The mischievous monkey travels across the window as the music plays. Children will admire the old-fashioned design and the curious illustrations that adorn the sides of this unique tin radio.

product.title: Curious George Tin Tea Playset
product.description: This 15-piece tin tea set includes service for four, a serving tray and a storage window box. The bright yellow dishes are trimmed in red and have pictures of Curious George.

product.title: Curious George Travel Cube 4-in-1 Game Set
product.description: Enjoy Bingo, two classic card games, and an exciting four-in-a-row game with this Curious George Travel Cube 4-in-1 Game Set! A red cord carrying handle makes this spectacular gaming set easy to take with you. Get together with George and the man with the yellow hat for endless hours of entertainment.

product.title: Curious George Travel Activity Kit
product.description: Give your curious little one an entire kit that is packed full of Curious George activities. Stimulate your child's imagination with this spectacular Curious George Travel Activity Kit at home or on the go!

product.title: Curious George Happy Birthday Banner
product.description: Here's a great birthday idea: the Curious George customized birthday banner! It announces to all who pass by that it's your child's birthday. Curious George holds a big birthday cake on the personalized banner that can be customized with a name.

product.title: Curious George Happy Birthday Yard Sign
product.description: Curious George has a cake for the birthday child! He's pictured on this personalized birthday yard sign that tells everyone where the party is. The custom made yard sign says Happy Birthday to your child, so be sure to add a name.
